Clockwork Patron.name: Clockwork Patron
Clockwork Patron.description:
Your patron grants you an affinity for manipulating clockwork and infusing your magic into its mechanical operations. If you select a clockwork specific familiar, the Toggle Standby Mode only requires a single action from your familiar. Your familiar knows one common or uncommon gadget formula of your level. When you gain a level you can choose to have your familiar learn a gadget formula of your level or lower instead of a spell.

Mephistopholes Patron.name: Mephistopholes Patron
Mephistopholes Patron.description:
Your patron is the archdevil @Compendium[pf2e.deities.KWVdoAm3b01M8Lcp]{Mephistopheles}, ruler of Caina, the Eighth Layer of Hell, and you are tasked with bringing him more contracts as part of your service. You and your familiar can draft an Infernal Contract of your level or lower with a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d9gbpiQjChYDYA2L]{Decipher Writing} DC equal to your spellcasting proficiency and Mephistopheles as the beneficiary of the payment clause. You must attempt a @Check[type:crafting]{Crafting} check of a hard DC equal to the level of the Infernal Contract chosen with no cost. You can only have one Infernal Contract open at a time or attempts to create another Infernal Contract automatically fail. You can never agree to an Infernal Contract without @Compendium[pf2e.deities.KWVdoAm3b01M8Lcp]{Mephistopheles}’ approval, whether created by you or another devil.
